column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Every time I am in town
column2: I try to hit Wildberrys for breakfast.  The selections are great.  The omelets are awesome
column3: and the pancakes are too.  I have had both the veggie and fresca omelets made with egg whites along with multi-grain pancakes and all thumbs up!  Get there early even on weekdays
column4: it is very popular by both the locals and out of towners.
